patterns: can you tell me a joke?
responses:
Hero Salman Khan went to see the girl. The girl's mother fainted when she saw him. When he regained consciousness, everyone asked him:
Everyone: Why unconscious?
Daughter's mother: She came to see me 20 years ago.

Laboni is looking at almost all the designs of the shop while choosing shoes.
The shoe showroom was completely destroyed. But I didn't like any of them.
 At that moment, she noticed a different box.
Laboni: Show me that box, please. I will see the design inside it.
Shopkeeper: Please don't want to see that anymore!
Laboni: How is that? Customer wants to see.
Shopkeeper: Apa, that's my lunch box!

OC: Why didn't you report the credit card loss immediately?
Montu: After the card was stolen, I saw that the thief was spending less than my wife.
OC: Why are you coming to report now?
Montu: Now it seems that the card has fallen into the hands of the thief's wife, the cost has quadrupled.

There are job interviews in railways. Everyone liked a nimble boy. The chairman wanted to check a little-
Chairman: Hold on, a fast train is coming. Suddenly the line is broken. The train needs to stop. What will you do?
Candidate: I will fly the red flag.
Chairman: What if it's night?
Candidate: Show red light.
Chairman: What if there is no red light?
Candidate: Then I will call my sister.
Chairman: Sister! What will your sister do?
Candidate: Don't do anything. His hobby for many days is watching a train accident!
My pleasure
